mapper.select: SELECT count(o.id) as count FROM cs_agents o WHERE o.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
SELECT o.id, o.created_at, o.status, o.terminals_list, o.terminals_quantity, o.apply_num FROM cs_agents o WHERE o.customer_id = #{customerId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{rows}
SELECT o.id, o.`status` AS apply_status, o.created_at AS apply_time, o.terminals_quantity,o.terminals_list, o.apply_num, o.address,o.reason FROM cs_agents o WHERE o.id = #{id}
SELECT crm.content AS marks_content, crm.created_at, c.`name` AS marks_person FROM cs_agent_marks crm LEFT JOIN customers c ON crm.customer_id = c.id WHERE crm.cs_agent_id = #{id}
